00028 #include "AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel()
00032     : AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel(),
00033       mGeneration(0)
00034 {
00035 }
00036 
00037 void AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision()
00038 {
00039     mGeneration++;
00040     if (mGeneration > TissueConfig::Instance()->GetMaxTransitGenerations())
00041     {
00042         mpCell->SetCellProliferativeType(DIFFERENTIATED);
00043     }
00044     if (mpCell->GetCellProliferativeType() == STEM)
00045     {
00046         mGeneration = 0;
00047     }
00048     AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision();
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 void AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell()
00053 {
00054     /*
00055      * If the parent cell is a stem cell then its generation was reset
00056      * to zero when ResetForDivision() was called. The daughter cell's
00057      * generation must therefore be incremented here.
00058      */
00059     if (mGeneration == 0)
00060     {
00061         mGeneration = 1;
00062     }
00063     /*
00064      * In generation-based cell cycle models, the daughter cell
00065      * is always of type transit or differentiated.
00066      */
00067     mpCell->SetCellProliferativeType(TRANSIT);
00068     if (mGeneration > TissueConfig::Instance()->GetMaxTransitGenerations())
00069     {
00070         mpCell->SetCellProliferativeType(DIFFERENTIATED);
00071     }
00072     AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell();
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 void AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::SetGeneration(unsigned generation)
00077 {
00078     mGeneration = generation;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 unsigned AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::GetGeneration() const
00083 {
00084     return mGeneration;
00085 }
